<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update Login IP Allow List</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/ip_allow_list_login/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Updates a named list of CIDRs (IP addresses) that are in the allow list for login access.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"ID of named network","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}>

Model for login IP allow list parameters

</div></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cidr"} required={true} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"List of CIDRs to Allow List for login access. You can include from 1 to 10 CIDRs","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Description of CIDR (IP addresses) allow list","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Unique name for CIDR (IP addresses) allow list","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation
